documents.document: New World Order Will Become Vital Because Interests of "ALL" Structural Elements Will Become MORE Important Than Interests of Some of Them.
New World Order Will Become Vital Because All The Interests & Rights of All Structural Elements MUST Be Protected Globally.
New World Order Will Become Vital Because Every Leader Will Try Pleasing His/Her Tribe BUT Angering Many Tribes All Over The World.
New World Order Will Become Vital Because Our World Will Benefit From All The Available Knowledge That Can Be Shared Globally.
New World Order Will Become Vital Because The World Will Naturally Reject The Out of Date Ways of All Former Empire & Superpowers.
New World Order Will Become Vital Because God Created World That Would ONLY Function According to God's Laws/Solutions/Systems/Master Plan.
New World Order Will Become Vital Because Leaders Will Become Unable to Solve The Very Complex Global Problems.
New World Order Will Become Vital Because Leaders Will Become Unable to Understand The Roots & Causes of The Very Complex Global Problems.
New World Order Will Become Vital Because Leaders Will Become Unable to Deal Successfully With Very Complex Global Issues.

New World Order Will Explain Critical Importance of Responsibility & Accountability Towards The Supreme Leader of The World, The Creator.
New World Order Will Explain Critical Importance of Loyalty, Allegiance & Sincerity Towards The Supreme Leader of The World, The Creator.

New World Order Will Explain The Critical Importance of God's ONLY Religion Monotheism, Know In Arabic As Islam.
New World Order Will Adopt God's Religion/Laws/Solutions/Master Plan For Solving All Global Problems & Eliminating Conflicts of Interests.
New World Order Will Allow For Global Educating & Eliminating All Rigid Mindsets, Tribal/Divisive Ideologies & Backward/Out of Date Ways.
New World Order Will Lead The Human Family Towards Achieving, Maintaining & Guaranteeing Global Peace, Security & Prosperity.

New World Order Will Become Global Reality When God Chooses The Right Time In The Near Future.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Knowledge Sharing Will Always Maximise Entrepreneurship, Innovations & Inventions.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Global Open Communications Channels Can Always Improve Global Processes Through Improved Global Memory.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Global Vertical & Horizontal Integrations Can Be Achieved Between All Structural Elements.
New World Order Is Needed For Connecting & Networking All Disconnected Structural Elements Because of Failed, Tribal & Divisive Leaders.
New World Order Is Needed For Empowering All Global Citizens Who Will Become Integral Parts of The Global Decision Making Processes.
New World Order Is Needed Because Old World Disorder Cannot Continue Forever.
New World Order MUST Be Implemented ASAP in order to Move Our World Forward.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby All States Will Always Focus on Meeting The Needs of All Global Citizens.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Global Unity, Integration, Harmonisation & Synchronisation Can Always Be Achieved & Maintained.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Any Leader Anywhere In The World Can Face Justice For Crimes Committed.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Global Equality, Justice & Rule of Law Can "ALWAYS" Be Maintained & Guaranteed.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby All States Will Have Compatible, Objective, Consistent, Connecting, Synergic & Progressive Constitutions.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby The Visionary Leaders of The World Can Lead Our World Towards Global Peace, Security & Prosperity.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby The Democratic Processes Between States-Governance-Religion Can Be Continuously Improved & Developed.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby No State Will Be Run By Mentally Retarded Unstable Leader.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby "ALL" States Will Have True, Honest, Competent, Capable, Educated & Knowledgeable Leaders.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Global Efficiency, Effectiveness, Productivity, Performance & Outputs Can Be Maximised.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby States Will Have Open Borders & All Structural Elements Can Live In Peace, Security & Prosperity.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby States Have No National Debts & Have Guaranteed National Incomes For Meeting The Needs of All Citizens.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Needs of All Structural Elements Can Be Met Using Strategic, Global & Democratic Systems/Solutions.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby States Recognise Critical Importance of God's Religion, Solutions & Systems For Global Peace & Security.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby All Structural Elements Can Work Together As Strategic Partners Towards Common Global Objectives.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Major Weapon Producing States Are NOT Responsible For Global Peace & Security.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Master/Slave Settings of UNSC Are Eliminated.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby Undemocratic Leaders of Oil Producing States Cannot Be Protected When Abusing Human Rights of Citizens.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby The Media Doesn't Lie About Corruption & Criminality of Leaders.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby States Don't Need to Invade, Attack & Occupy Other States For Achieving Economic Prosperity For Invaders.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby States Cannot Invent Excuses (Islamic Terrorism) For Continuously Invading States For Selling Weapons.
New World Order Is Needed Whereby States Cannot Invent Excuses (Islamic Terrorism) For Continuously Invading States For Taking Their Oil.
States With Muslim Majorities Don't Attack, Invade & Occupy States With Christian Majorities.
We Cannot Solve The Global Problems WITHOUT Addressing The Real Global Problems.
Strategic Partnerships MUST Be Developed Between The Christian & Muslim Worlds For Focusing on Common Interests, e.g. Constant Flow of Oil.
Leaders of The Christian & Muslim Worlds MUST Realise The Time Has Come For Ending All Cycles & Circles of Criminal Actions & Reactions.
State Terrorisms By States With Christian Majorities Will Fuel Terrorisms By Militants & Militant Groups From States With Muslim Majorities.
Leaders of The Christian & Muslim Worlds MUST Understand The Continuous Cycles & Circles of Criminal Actions & Criminal Reactions MUST End.
States With Christian Majorities Are Failing to Understand Risks & Dangers of Invading/Attacking/Occupying States With Muslim Majority.
Criminal Actions By States With Christian Majorities Will Always Produce Criminal Reactions By Militants/Militant Groups Amongst Muslims.
States With Christian Majorities Invading/Attacking/Occupying States With Muslim Majority Create Hatred Between The Christian/Muslim Worlds.
Ending Criminal Activities of Militants & Militant Groups Will Require Ending Invading, Attacking & Occupying Middle Eastern States.
Militants & Militant Groups Target States (e.g. USA, Russia & EU States) That Invade, Attack & Occupy The Middle East.
Militants & Militant Groups Don't Target States (e.g. China, India & Others) That Don't Invade, Attack & Occupy The Middle East.

We Reject Drug Dealers Selling Drugs Killing Citizens. Similarly, We MUST Reject Weapon Dealers Selling Weapons Used For Killing Citizens.
All Leaders, Governments, Intelligence Agencies & Armed Forces Should Have Realised That Our World Is Going Through Global Transformation.
The Global Chaos Clearly Prove We Are In The Process of Moving Away From The Old World Disorder to The New World Order Benefiting Everyone.
We Can "Today" Introduce New World Order Using New Global Financial & Monetary Systems That Don't Rely on Selling Weapons.
Our World Urgently Needs New World Order Using New Global Financial & Monetary Systems That Don't Rely on Selling Weapons.
Trusting Permanent Members of UNSC Ending Wars Is Like Trusting Drug Dealers Cleaning The Streets/Cities From Drugs.
Global Peace & Security Will Never Ever Be Achieved When Permanent Members of UNSC Start & Fuel Wars For Selling Weapons.
Global Peace & Security Will Never Ever Be Achieved When Permanent Members of UNSC Rely on The Incomes/Profits From Producing Weapons.
